mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.meizhuang_order_uuid_number as meizhuangOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.meizhuang_id as meizhuangId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.meizhuang_order_true_price as meizhuangOrderTruePrice ,a.meizhuang_order_courier_name as meizhuangOrderCourierName ,a.meizhuang_order_courier_number as meizhuangOrderCourierNumber ,a.meizhuang_order_types as meizhuangOrderTypes ,a.meizhuang_order_payment_types as meizhuangOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
